Well quit your bitchin’ because Amul’s kitchen is up and cooking again.
Although not identical, the menu continues to reflect mostly North India cuisines.
While the 101 Beer Kitchen name implies plenty of brews, the emphasis has been on the food of the comforting modern...
We usually scoff when our server is the bartender (especially if we are not seated at the bar), but the duo behind the bar at Matt’s did a nice job with our service. Drinks and food...
Candice: 101 Beer Kitchen is the choice today! Paul: It's not exactly close to downtown, all the way to Sawmill Road outside the outer belt. Candice: But we've gone farther for good food...
101 Beer Kitchen is one of the latest concepts launched carrying the gastropub banner. The focus is on craft beer and comfort food made from local ingredients. The cavernous space...
Nothing fancy. Just cold beer and great pizza. LOVE IT

The shrimp & avocado gespacho was mouth watering. Loved the pretzels. The wedge salad was delicious with the bacon crumbles perfectly smoked. The beer menu was overwhelming but our server was very knowledgable. We will return for sure!

The food at this restaurant is at the best average. It's nothing really special. It's the service that was horrible. We had a hard time getting our drinks refilled and our server was just plain awkward and weird. He would just randomly stand right in front of our table, stare at some far distance or us, while we had dirty dishes and empty drink glasses on our table for a real long time. And they weren't even that busy! Don't think I'll ever be going back. Our server was horrible and there was nothing special about the food to bring me back here. Definitely on my blacklist.
Last chance to get tickets for @seventhsonbrew Beer Dinner Tues 8/13, check out the menu: t.co/jzJfVhT8Yb
RT @LibbyGi: @MTMTavern it was great as always! Haven't been in a while so it was fun to return! I look for great customer service. You del…
We went to Baja and all we got you were these fish tacos. SCORE! #fishtacos t.co/RCpqQcxWBS
